subtitles.dialogue_text: TOKUMA SHOTEN presents Â© 1986 Nibariki - Tokuma Shoten
Hold them off! Get down on the floor.
What are you waiting for! Break it down!
There's the stone. Quick, go next door!
Original story written and directed by Hayao MIYAZAKI
What are you up to? Where's my dinner?
A girl fell from the sky.
Boss, she fell from the sky.
Ouch! Pazu, toss me a wrench.
I can't let go. You do it.
Shut down the boiler Call it a day.
I'll go under at this rate.
Mama, I can't see a thing. It's too dark.
All right. We'll wait for daylight
Hi How are you feeling? Hold on there: :.
I'm Pazu. I live by myself
They eat a fter I play.
So you are human a fter all.
I was a fraid you were an angel.
Thanks for helping me. I'm Sheeta.
Sheeta, nice name. You fell from the sky. A bit scary.
That's right. Why am I still alive?
It's been in my family forever
So it wasn't the stone a fter all.
I'm fine. Sorry, did it hurt?
No, my head's harder than my boss's fists
Laputa, an island in the sky.
They say it's only a myth. .
There's a Laputa in Gulliver's Travels: but Swift made it up
He said the abandoned palace was full of treasure.
Until he died, they called him a liar.
I m building a real plane. I'm going to find Laputa...
Sure, yesterday... The boss's kid, Madge: :.
What! She was disguised! Tell mama!
A cute little girl ... brown hair, braids...
Go home. Just poor folk here
What a nice girl. Protect her.
Who's going to mend that shirt?
Think you can fool me? After them!
Take us to the next town. The police!
You idiots! Hurry up and get on!
She slipped out the back door.
Don't let them escape! Dump this over the side!
I refuse to give up. Move!
This is a surprise. If it isn't the army.
These kids need help! They've got pirates a fter them.
It was the stone after all! Amazing!
We'll float all the way down.
I have to get that amazing stone!
I hope the Boss and the engineer aren't in any trouble.
Aw, don't worry. Miners aren't exactly wimps
These mines are ancient. Tunnels everywhere.
I m so happy I was starving
I've still got an apple and some candy.
It's like you have a magical bag that holds everything.
Yes. Both my parents died, but they left me
the house and the fields, so I was getting by alone. .
The guys with dark glasses kidnapped you.
That guy was one of them?
Who can they be, calling in the army?
The Dolas and the other guys, all want the stone
But I had no idea it had mysterious powers
It was always in our family. Mother left it to me when she died
She warned me never to show it or give it to anyone.
I'm sorry I dragged you into all of this.
When you fell from the sky my heart was racing
I knew something wonderful had begun.
Now that little demon sure looks like Pazu...
with a little girl demon beside him.
Why no, no. The rocks have been astir...
That's when I like to be down here.
As soon as it's exposed to the air, it becomes ordinary stone.
Oh, my gracious! That's a Volucite crystal, my dear.
That's why the rocks were stirring.
I thought only Laputans knew how to make Volucite crystals.
They used Volucite to send a magnificent island alof t...
Laputa did exist, Sheeta! It really did!
Dear, would you mind covering the stone? Its power overwhelms me.
The rocks shif t when Laputa floats overhead.
If you went up to the sky then, you'd find Laputa!
My father was telling the truth!
I know it as one who has spoken to rocks all my life.
A stone so powerful brings happiness, but it can also bring misery.
What's more, your stone is the work of men.
That stone's already saved Sheeta twice!
Let's go back to the ship
When it's this quiet, it's best to stay put
Beyond those clouds is an island we've only dreamed of.
Here I come! I know I'm going to find Laputa!
My family had a mysterious ancient name which came
My name is Lucita, Lucita Toelle Ur...
Spoken like a man in uniform
In your haste, you risk everything.
If we'd mobilized the army sooner, Dola wouldn't have had a chance.
She managed to decipher your third-rate code
You concentrate on mobilizing the troops when the time is ripe.
Muska! Remember, I command the search for Laputa!
Of course But I have my orders from the government
Where's Pazu? Let me see him!
Don't fret about Pazu. His stubborn head is harder than mine
Come, I have something to show you.
A mechanical soldier with vast destructive power
Had he not fallen from the sky, no one would have believed in Laputa
This insignia was carved on your fireplace
The stone works only in your hands.
It will protect you and guide you back to Laputa.
Take it if you like Just leave us alone...
You imagine Laputa's like Treasure Island...
Fearsome powers thrust Laputa into orbit.
Their dreaded empire once ruled the earth!
Even you can appreciate that when such an entity
roams the skies, it threatens Peace.
You must know how to make the stone guide us to Laputa.
I really don't know! Please let me see Pazu!
I intend no harm, but his fate rests with you.
The boy goes free if you assist us, Lucita. .
Ur means ruler in Laputan, Toelle means True,
Queen Lucita, rightful heir to the Laputan throne
I'm fine. You? Did they do anything horrible?
My dear Pazu, we misjudged you. Accept our apologies.
We didn t know how gallantly
you protected her from the pirates.
Pazu, I beg you, forget about Laputa.
Sheeta will aid us in our search for Laputa.
I understand how you feel, but forget about her
Is this true, Sheeta? But we...
I'm sorry for all the trouble. .
Be reasonable. Act like a man.
Here's a token of our gratitude. It's yours.
Only you can recall the words that will waken this stone: :.
If you keep your promise, you, too, shall be free.
We were so worried. You just disappeared.
Let me go! What are you doing!
Can't even protect a little girl...
You let them pay you of f...
So you gave in and crawled home.
You talk big, but you're a fter Sheeta too.
But of course, we're pirates. Pirates hunt for treasure.
They're the strange ones. What's the girl to them?
You think she'll get out alive?
They threatened her, so she tried to save you.
She steels her heart to save her man. How touching.
You boys want to marry, look for one like her.
So... that girl... Will grow up to be mama?
They'll pack her up and take off. Time is short.
I want the crystal, not the girl.
The stone's no good without her
Can't I go with you, Ma'am?
Not so fast. Do it on your own nickel
You're right, if I was clever and strong, I could've defended her.
Please, I don't care about treasure.
But you could probably help us with her.
Tie this to your belt. You boys wait on the ship.
A magnificent vessel. Has the girl come through?
I need a little more time
Forget it! We'll squeeze it out of her up there.
We depart at dawn, with the girl.
Sheeta, listen, I'm going to teach you
Yes. These are old, old, old, secret words.
They mean help me rekindle the light.
Just as the ancient books described. This is the sacred light.
What are the magic words? Tell me.
The sacred light broke his seal!
This is the way to Laputa! Come!
It's showing the way to Laputa
Use explosives! But don't blow up the ship!
Hello, hello, hello! What is this!
This is Colonel Muska The robot's cut our lines
It's a fter the girl on the tower.
What's that! Must be a battle.
We're going directly into the crossfire Regroup!
Straight ahead, she's on top of that tower!
This is a job for a woman! Cover me
Last chance! Grab her on the fly!
Destroyed. The girl went that way.
Put out the fire! Organize a search party!
We haven't lost the sacred stone.
Inform the General, we'll depart for Laputa as planned.
I can't believe she'll grow up to be just like mama...
There's your valley... Back where we started.
Call me Captain! What use are you without the crystal?
I want to see Laputa for myself.
Don't want any treasure, just to see Laputa? Suspect motives
Are they coming with us, mama?
One false move and you're shark bait!
Excellent! No more laundry or cleaning duty!
Enough out of you! When will you boys ever grow up!
Hurry up, it's crowded in here!
Now where'd he go? Pops! Pops!
He's tougher than mama. Be careful.
The crystal pointed nearly due east...
I could see the sunrise from the tower. Lt's the harvest season now,
so the sun rises just south of due east.
The light pointed to the left of the sun rose.
We're upwind of them. If we get a lift on the trade winds.
Goliath's on its way to Laputa. We're on their tail
With these winds, I expect contact tomorrow
Ten gold pieces to whoever spots her first!
Whatever we find, I m sure Laputa has riches enough for any pirate gang!
You serve five meals a day. Go easy on the water.
I'm sorry, dinner isn't ready yet
I've never cooked on an airship...
I thought I'd give you a hand in my spare time.
Why thank you. Can you put those dishes away?
I've got some free time. Can l: :.
You've changed, chasing the likes of Goliath... But it's pointless.
It's Laputan treasure I'm af ter.
Get to the point, you crank
They're too upright and honest to ever respect you
I really don't want to go to Laputa.
I hope we never find Goliath.
The light really did point that way.
I never dreamed that little spell could...
I learned lots of other spells.
To help find things, cure the sick. And one I must never, ever use.
I had to learn bad ones so the good spells had power But not to use...
I was so scared, I couldn't sleep...
That stone should be locked away
They hid it in the fireplace. Only wore it for weddings
My mother's and grandmother's and great great grandmother's.
I should have thrown it away.
You're wrong. We only met because of the stone.
Throwing it away won't change anything
Airships are improving. Someone will find it.
I don't know what to do, but if Laputa is so dangerous,
it's sure not for the likes of Muska
if we run now, they'll hunt us forever
But don't become a pirate for me.
Dola understands. She's nicer than she looks.
Once things are settled, I'll take you to Gondoa.
I want to see where you were born, the valley, the yaks...
Do we have to hurry? I hate to lose them.
We can't catch them in this fog.
We'll get them They won't go far
If we lose Goliath, it's all over.
Follow them in the crow's nest.
It turns into a glider. See the crank?
Once it's locked, the upper lever spreads the wings.
Use the wire to stabilize them. Figure out how to steer as you go!
But so are you! Besides, I'm a mountain girl with sharp eyesight
Once you're alof t, the voice tube won't work. See the head set?
OK. I ll give it a try. Release us
Stay alert. They could be anywhere.
Ran into a gust of wind.
I'm getting the hang of it. Rough skies ahead
Get the rope from my bag, Sheeta.
Lousy luck. Storm coming up. . How long 'til dawn?
Strange that the sun's rising on that side...
I know! We're supposed to be heading east Bridge!
The shif ting winds must have put us of fcourse.
Lt's a cloud. A huge one: :.
We're headed into a low pressure system.
So this is the Dragon's Lair...
Dad said, that wind blew in opposite directions.
Look out, a wall of wind!
Don't give up! Be a man!
Dad saw Laputa inside the Dragon's Lair.
Ridiculous! It'll blow you to smithereens!
Let's go! It's the path dad took. He made it back
Into the Dragon's Lair we go!
The light's pointing right for the clouds.
Stay the course. We ll find a way in.
Sheeta, Sheeta! Are you all right?
Wait. I tied it really tight
But I don't have the stone
Please don't break that. We need it to get home
I'm glad no eggs were broken.
A city so advanced... Why did it: :.
A grave... I wish I could read the writing.
It broke a long time ago.
...who protected this place ever since the people went away.
You picked flowers for the grave.
Are you all alone? Are there any other robots here?
He doesn't seem to be lonely
He's got friends and birds'nests to look a fter.
I hope the pirates are OK
I'll give you plenty... of rope.
Have you reported we found Laputa?
Make the code good and complicated
The perfect distraction for those idiots.
The only way to save this.
Is to get the stone back
I see why the clouds parted.
Otherwise they never could have landed
Muska was right. The seal's broken, and
It's welcomed the visitor with the stone
But Muska will become the king.
He's got much worse in mind
But what do I do with the stone when I get it back.
Well if it isn't the little princess
The last of the pirates There's one right under you.
They've got Sheeta I'm going a fter her I'll cut your ropes. Escape.
The boy has become a man.
Yes, while the ship was short-handed.
Some of the guards are badly wounded.
The Colonel is in a black sphere down there.
That upstart's finally showing his colors.
Laputa's core. The castle above is just a trinket.
All of Laputa's knowledge is crystallized here.
Only royalty may enter the sacred area
Behold the giant crystal! Source of Laputa's power.
Fantastic. It has awaited a king for 700 years
The black rock! As the epics described!
I can read, I can read it!
I, too, have an ancient, secret name Lucita.
My name is Romuska Palo Ur Laputa
We are descended from the same royal family...
. that split in two down on earth.
Force won't be necessary, Your Excellency
What is this! Muska, where are you!
Watch your tongue You're in the presence of Laputa's king.
Let's celebrate Laputa's resurrection with a display of its power.
It's the heavenly fire that destroyed Sodom and Gomorrah.
It's the Ramayana's Arrow of Indra.
The world shall bow down before Laputa once more!
Wonderful, Muska You're a hero. A monumental achievement.
I've had it up to here with your stupid face.
What are you two doing! I'll have to leave you behind
I advise you not to anger me.
You think you can fight me?
Be a good girl, give it back.
Take this, hurry! Muska's coming, quick!
Hold onto that stone I'll trade her life for it
Stand up! No time left for hide and seek.
How delightful that it should end in the throne room Come here!
The throne room? This will be our grave Ours.
What is a king when his country lies ruined
I won't give you the stone.
You'll die, trapped here with me. There's no escape
This is why Laputa died out.
There's a song in my valley. . Put down your roots in the soil
Let us live together with the wind
Pass the winter with the seeds, sing in the spring with the birds:.
No matter how powerful your weapons, or numerous your poor robots,
you can't survive apart from the earth
Laputa will not die. It will revive.
Its power is the stuf fof humanity's dreams
Next, I shoot off your ears!
Beg for your life Make the kid hand over the stone
The stone's hidden You can shoot, but you won't get it
Stay away, Pazu. He'll kill us both.
I'll spare her lif e if you tell me where the stone is.
Or do you intend to conquer me with that cannon of yours?
Let me talk to Sheeta alone.
Don't come. Throw it away and run!
Sheeta, calm down and listen. Repeat the words of that spell.
Time's up. What do you say?
Sheeta was such a nice girl...
They used the spell of destruction.
Those kids saved Laputa from those idiots.
The tree... it's carrying it away Chase it!
What are you doing, we're not moving.
Oh, stop blubbering. We'll make a better ship!
You poor child, the worst is having your hair hacked of f.
Pathetic. All that work, and only this to show.
Voices PAZU Mayumi TANAKA SHEETA Keiko YOKOZAWA
DOLA Kotoe HATSUI MUSKA Minori TERADA UNCLE POM Fujio TOKITA
English subtitles by AURA and Sony PCL
Original story written and directed by Hayao MIYAZAKI
